name: 沉浮（Sea of Craft）
description:
The "Sea Of Craft" is a physical construction game that supports multiplayer battles at sea. The game players need to design and create exclusive vehicles to engage in the sea battle. Racing, PK, Tower Defense are here waiting for you? Where there is an ark, there is hope!


Five major vehicle accessory systems including base, movement, physics, weapons and decoration, together with over 50 mold designs, could fully mobilize your imagination and strategy and assemble an exclusive ship!



Want your work to be known? Go to the workshop and share your vehicle! The uploaded works are all in the workshop. Just make your ship a classic!


The vehicles and the skills are indispensable on the road to fame. Racing, PK and Tower Defense are all necessary training steps. Then, fight against the sea!

【Lighthouse Competition】Get to the finish line ahead of obstacles to test your ship's performance.



【Whales Arena】1V1 vs. Super competitor, defeat him to become the king!



【Defend the Statue of Liberty】Defend the last Statue of Liberty and work with your team to defend against enemy warships.




The retro art style with realistic physical effects to jointly construct a super artistic wonderland and to open a beautiful fantasy journey. Towering lighthouses, winding cliffs, sacred statues and bloody arena, advancing and retreating just like life. Don't forget to appreciate the afterglow on the way to becoming a king.
